title: Cannot unlock skin permanent in looting
body:
Hi. I have unlocked the Xayah skin shard with 1050 essence, but it turned out fail and return me a skin permanent token in the looting page.
No matter how many times I clicked to unlock the skin permanent, it still gives an error message.

replies.body:
> **Update 10:30am Pacific - 
> **We believe the issue should be resolved now!  Restart your client and try again to redeem your goodies!

Anyone just tuning in, we're good on info and screenshots for now.  The redemption failed issue has been escalated to the proper team to investigate resolve.  I've put up a [pinned post](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Z3zIAhas-8417-hextech-crafting-failed-to-redeem) for now where we'll be posting updates as they come.
Gods.

Hi Rioter, I have also unlocked a Xin Zhao skin but unable to make it permanent. May I ask if you can also help to check my account out? 

much obliged :)

I'm currently collecting info right now to forward to the proper team and get more details on what's going on.  What I could use right now are specifics of any errors or screenshots that you're getting when trying to unlock your Xin Zhao skin.  If it is saying Redemption Failed, what happens if you try spamming redeem?

It will stack the notification that you've received your loot in the background on top of itself if you don't X out of them. I have no idea if this contributes to helping but it's something I've noticed from spamming redeem. I just closed out 19 loot added notifications for the same skin. lol
